summary: Unique companion with custom AI that can actually heal you and your allies
descriptionHtml:
[img=center]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/18075-4-1339701202.jpg[/img]
Natalie is a healer companion, equipped with her own AI and custom spells to heal you and your allies.

She looks for people with low health and chooses the best suited healing spell based on injury, distance and her magicka. She possesses different healings spells and even masters Grand Healing to save your party in critical situations.

[img=center]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/18075-3-1339701202.jpg[/img]

Natalie focuses mailnly on healing and starts with the following custom healing spells. You can use mods like UFO to train her new spells. I recommend training her a ward spell, when she reaches a higher level. Remember that she needs to reach a higher level before she can cast the stronger spells.

[list]
[*]Healing (short)
[*]Healing (medium)
[*]Healing (long)
[*]Healing (long)
[*]Fast Healing
[*]Healing Hands (short)
[*]Healing Hands (medium)
[*]Healing Hands (long)
[*]Healing Hands (dual medium)
[*]GrandHealing (aoe heal)
[/list]
[img=center]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/18075-2-1339701202.jpg[/img]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=14037]UFO Ultimate Follower Overhaul[/url]
More followers for Natalie to heal. Train Natalie new spells. Followers are not regenerating health (they do only in relax mode). You can make Natalie essential. Many other Features.

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=16221]No Health and Reduced Magicka Regeneration[/url]
The Player is not regenerating health.

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15236]FCResurrect[/url]
I recommend to set all your followers to non-essential with UFO (\"you are not important\") and use this resurrection spell mod in case one of them dies.

[img=center]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/18075-1-1339701148.jpg[/img]
There are different looks in the download section to change Natalies appearance
[img=center]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/18075-1-1339703917.jpg[/img]
[center]no additional mods required
[/center]
[img=center]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/18075-2-1339703921.jpg[/img]
[center]requires:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=8583]The Ashen - Oriental Beauty Race[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7403]Lovely Hairstyles[/url]
[/center]
[img=center]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/18075-3-1339703921.jpg[/img]
[center]requires:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=8583]The Ashen - Oriental Beauty Race[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168]ApachiiSkyHair[/url]
[/center]
[img=center]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/18075-4-1339703922.jpg[/img]
[center]requires:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=8583]The Ashen - Oriental Beauty Race[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168]ApachiiSkyHair[/url]
[/center]
[img=center]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/18075-5-1339703922.jpg[/img]
[center]no additional mods required
[/center]
[img=center]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/18075-1-1339703939.jpg[/img]
[center]no additional mods required
[/center]


[img=center]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/18075-5-1339701203.jpg[/img]
[center][youtube]2CK2LjDG0K0[/youtube]
(starts at 4:47)
[/center]

[img=center]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/18075-5-1339701150.jpg[/img]

with Nexus Mod Manager:

1. Download Main mod file via NMM
2. (optional) Choose and download one of Natalies appearance mods via NMM
3, Activate Main mod in Mod Manager
4. (optional) Activate appearance mod on Mod Manager, when asked to upgrade hit \"no\"
5. Check the load order
6. Start game


Manual installation:

1. Download Main mod file
2. (optional) Choose and download one of Natalies appearance mods
3. Extract both zip files to the skyrim data folder
4. Make sure the Main esp is loaded before the Look esp
5. Start game


Load order:

skyrim.esm
update.esm
...    other mods esms    ...
RaceCompatibility.esm (if you use The Ashen mod)
ApachiiHair.esm (if you use ApachiiHair mod)
...    other mods esps    ...
LovelyHairstyles.esp (if you use Loverlyhair mod)
OrientalRace.esp (if you use The Ashen mod)
...     other mods that use The Ashen or Lovely Hair    ...
Natalie - Healer Follower.esp
Natalie - Healer Follower - Look x.esp (if you use a appearance mod)


[img=center]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/18075-1-1339701201.jpg[/img]

You can find Natalie in the Temple of Kynareth in Whiterun.



[img=center]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/18075-4-1339701150.jpg[/img]

[font=\"Verdana\"][b]The game won\'t start anymore! Why?[/b][/font]
Here are some things you can check and try:
Check the load order. 
Check if you have all required mods installed. 
Sort out which mods are conflicting or causing the problem by adding and testing the mods one after another.

[font=\"Verdana\"][b]Her face is all black or dark! How can I fix that?[/b][/font]
Check the load order. The look esp must be loaded after the main esp

[font=\"Verdana\"][b]Why isn\'t she healing at all?[/b][/font]
Check if her magicka is low or stuck. Did you install any other mods effecting her magicka?
Try to punsh her with fists, that resets her AI and magicka regeneration rate (indicated by message in upper left corner)

If you upgraded from a old version, try a new clean upgrade:
1. Uninstall the mod
2. Load your save game
3. Save the game
4. Quit the game
5. Install latest version of the mod
6. Load your save game

[font=\"Verdana\"][b]She\'s ugly![/b][/font]
Thats not a question. Try one of the appearance mods above or make your own appearance mod (it\'s easy!)

[font=\"Verdana\"][b]She\'s dead. How can I get her back?[/b][/font]
Use this resurrection spell mod:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15236]FCResurrect[/url]
or resurrect her with console:
open console, left click on natalie (her ID is shown), type \"resurrect\", hit enter, close console.
You might want to make her essential with UFO.

[font=\"Verdana\"][b]I resurrected her, now she won\'t heal me anymore. How can i make her heal again?[/b][/font]
Try to punsh her with fists, that resets her AI (indicated by message in upper left corner)

[font=\"Verdana\"][b]Why is she not leveling and why is so weak?[/b][/font]
Natalie is set to auto level from 1 to 50 with multiplier 1.0. That means her level will be set to the Players level, when you first meet her. Currently followers stats are not recaclulated in skyrim resulting in the followers level to raise but not their stats. With third party mods like UFO you can recalculate the stats (\"train some, you are weak\"). If you install Natalie to existing save game you have to level your Player first before you can recalculate her stats.
The latest skyrim patch might have fixed the follower leveling issue.

[img=center]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/18075-2-1339701149.jpg[/img]
[img=center]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/18075-3-1339701149.jpg[/img]
I want to thank:
thekineticeffect - For helping me with custom races and custom hairstyles
RandomNoob - For answering my scripting questions in the forum
author: ParallaxZero

files.name: Main v0_1_1
files.changelogHtml:
Added: Out of Magicka message
Fixed: Sometimes not healing in combat
Fixed: Gets stuck in casting due to low magicka

files.name: Ashen Race Skin v0_2_0
files.changelogHtml:
Added: Out of magicka combat dialog (no sound; enable general subtitles)
Change: Remove LesserWard spell due to high magicka consuption on low level (use UFO to teach her again)
Change: Set level muliplier from 0.9 to 1.0 so stats recalculate faster in high level save game
Fixed: Natalie doesn\'t get stuck in greet friendly corpse animation anymore
Change: Better magicka handling
Added: Other followers comment on healing

files.name: Main v0_2_0
files.changelogHtml:
Added: Out of magicka combat dialog (no sound; enable general subtitles)
Change: Remove LesserWard spell due to high magicka consuption on low level (use UFO to teach her again)
Change: Set level muliplier from 0.9 to 1.0 so stats recalculate faster in high level save game
Fixed: Natalie doesn\'t get stuck in greet friendly corpse animation anymore
Change: Better magicka handling
Added: Other followers comment on healing

files.name: Main v0_3_0
files.changelogHtml:
Added: Grand Healing Spell ( Only cast when she finds suitable NPCs close to each other)
Added: Heals her self with different versions of Healing ( concentrated )
Added: Rarely heal NPCs above 90%
Added: Death disables AI ( Ressurection still works )
Added: Disable AI when player is not arround
Added: Natalie will rest her magicka for some time if she is out of magicka and out of combat
Added: Natalie is now marriable
Added: Punshing Natalie with fist resetst all her scripts (message now shown)
Change: Greatly reduced her magicka regen
Change: Natalie is not regenerating health anymore
Fixed: Check for unclean update
Fixed: Magicka was not renegerating ( punsh her if still )

files.name: Main v0_3_1
files.changelogHtml: Fixed: Missing face texture for main skin

files.name: Main v0_4_0
files.changelogHtml:
Added: Fast Healing (self) spell
Changed: Removed silent voice files from archives (Skyrim 1.6 now shows subtitle for missing voice)
Fixed: Natalie will now stop resting magicka if magicka is full
